body: $(function(){ var blockID = "editorcontainer0"; var modeId = 'css'; require.config({ paths: { vs: 'https://microsoft.github.io/monaco-editor/node_modules/monaco-editor/min/vs' } }); require(['vs/editor/editor.main'], function () { var editor = monaco.editor.create(document.getElementById(blockID), { language: modeId }); $.ajax({ type: 'GET', url: "https://microsoft.github.io/monaco-editor/index/samples/sample.css.txt", dataType: 'text', error: function () { console.log("load "+blockID+"'s sample fail.") } }).done(function (data) { var oldModel = editor.getModel(); var newModel = monaco.editor.createModel(data, modeId); editor.setModel(newModel); if (oldModel) { oldModel.dispose(); } }); }); })
title: CSS
